---
title: "Demand Plot"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE,fig.height=4)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
october<-read_csv("OctoberDemand.csv",col_types = cols(
     #X1 = col_double(),
     Stop_ID = col_factor(),
     Boardings = col_double(),
     Aligtings = col_double(),
     Total = col_double()
   ))
#october
g<-ggplot(october,aes(Stop_ID,Total))
g<-g+geom_bar(stat="identity")
g
october_sorted<-read_csv("OctoberDemandSorted.csv",col_types = cols(
     #X1 = col_double(),
     Stop_ID = col_factor(),
     Boardings = col_double(),
     Aligtings = col_double(),
     Total = col_double()
   ))
gs<-ggplot(october_sorted,aes(Stop_ID,Total))
gs<-gs+geom_bar(stat="identity")
gs
```
